Isfahan.title: Isfahan
Isfahan.byline: Isfahan (Persian: اصفهان, also known as Esfahan) is a city in central Iran, south of Tehran and is the capital of Isfahan Province.

Isfara.title: Isfara
Isfara.byline: Isfara is one of the most prosperous and beautiful cities of the Ferghana Valley of Tajikistan, in the basin of the colorful mountain ranges of Turkestan.
